inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: prior documented evidence of variable airflow obstruction

inclusion.criterion: Subjects on steps 4 and 5 of GINA asthma therapy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ICS and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg, one puff twice daily

exclusion.criterion: Patients with respiratory diseases with other known respiratory diseases including chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Individuals older than 40 years with a smoking history of more than 10 pack-years
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 39-year-old man with asthma, symptoms worsen at work and improve outside workplace
